topic: Does EPW file take daylight savings time into consideration?

replies.body:
1. No. You can adjust the input hour yourself.

2. Sunny sky is not a climate-based sky. It's a standard sky. It only uses the location data from the weather file. If you want to use the values from the weather file then you should use the climate-based sky instead of CIE skies.

Hi Ibby,

1. Yes.

2. [Check this document to learn more about the skies](http://climate-based-daylighting.com/lib/exe/fetch.php?media=resources:mardaljevic_chap5.pdf) and / or search for "CIE Sunny Sky Radiance".
